data.text: @harishbpuri @janaki2010 I’ll watch Norman tonight. I have a crush on Richard Gere ever since I saw him in Pretty Woman, and then in Shall We Dance. 😊

@AditiIndiaFirst @janaki2010 Yeah, they made a dashing couple. But just watch ‘Norman’ on Amazon Prime to see the devilishly handsome Richard Gere in a role that has him as an irritating, irascible, far from good looking character!
@harishbpuri @janaki2010 PS - I absolutely LOVE them both in Pretty Woman! 😍 Such a dreamy movie that is.
@harishbpuri @janaki2010 Homecoming is an excellent show! Haven’t watched Norman. Is it on Amazon Prime Video?
